projects.name: Course Tracker
projects.description: A full stack web application built for the directors of Austin Coding Academy during my internship at Zollege. With a team of 4-5 developers, our goal was to deliver a useful tool for them to record and keep track of past and ongoing bootcamp courses.

projects.name: Zospace
projects.description: A product site developed from a mockup design with a team of 5 for our internship at Zollege. I had ownership of the About page and its responsive format for a perfect layout on all screens.

projects.name: Billy
projects.description: My final capstone project for Austin Coding Academy. Billy is a full stack web app that helps users track and manage their monthly bills, quickly navigate to their banks' home pages, and find bank locations nearby.

projects.name: AIR Competition
projects.description: The Accessible Internet Rally (AIR) is a competition to raise awareness for global web accessibility. With a team of 6, our goal is to provide our clients with a brand new, fully accessible website.
